statements: DELETE FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory WHERE product_category = 'Electronics' AND purchase_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' AND purchase_amount > 1000
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM purchases WHERE total_amount < 1000);
DELETE FROM Purchase WHERE purchase_id = 100 AND total_amount > 500.00;
DELETE FROM Customer WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe' OR customer_email = 'john.doe@example.com';
